resources.string: This application is created by Artur Bednarczyk, Damian Fikier and Dominika Jurczyk.\nv.1.0.

Click start to play.
The goal of the game is to type as many words as possible in 60 seconds.
You get 1 point for every word.
To add your score to the scoreboard, enter your name and click "Submit".
Quiting the game before the time is up causes the end of the game.
Enter your nickname if you want to submit your score:
Make sure you are connected to the internet
